TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BamlLocalizableResourceKey extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于标识 中可本地化资源的键。

span.span: Represents a key that is used to identify localizable resources in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示一个用于唯一标识内可本地化的值的键[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]。This class represents a key that can uniquely identify a localizable value inside [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]. 它表示的组合，类名称和属性名称。It represents a combination of a , class name, and property name. 值必须添加到源[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件通过使用`updateuid`[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)]目标 (例如， `msbuild /t:updateuid myproj.proj`)，或手动在标记中。The value must be added to the source [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file either by using the `updateuid` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] target (for example, `msbuild /t:updateuid myproj.proj`), or manually in the markup. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] 而无需不能进行本地化。 without a cannot be localized. 类名是元素的包含可本地化属性的类型名称。The class name is the type name of the element that contains the localizable property. 属性名称是指具有可本地化值的属性。The property name refers to the property that has the localizable value. 特殊属性称为"`$Content`"用于表示元素的初始化文本或内容属性的值。A special property called "`$Content`" is used to represent values that are the initialization text or content property of an element. 例如`$Content`属性名称将会应用于初始化文本`Click`在下面的 XAML:For example the `$Content` property name would apply to the initialization text `Click` in the following XAML: `Click ` ## Examples 下面的示例展示了如何使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use a . [!code-csharp[GrabBaml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GrabBaml/CSharp/GrabBaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GrabBaml#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GrabBaml/visualbasic/grabbaml.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取定义可本地化资源类型（如资源的 所声明）的程序集的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the assembly that defines the type of the localizable resource as declared by its .
The name of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集名称不需要唯一标识中的资源[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)]但包括此处为方便起见。The assembly name is not required to uniquely identify a resource in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] but is included here as a convenience.
